name: Super Tri Shooter
description:
Super Tri Shooter Description:

In Super Tri Shooter, choose from 3 different ships to take on 3 different stages and 3 different enemies! Choose from 3 different levels of difficulty, and try to reach a score of over 1000!

Controls Menus: WS/Up and Down Keys: Move Cursor AD/Left and Right Keys: Change Option's Value (Options Menu), Change Ship (Ship Select) Space or Enter: Select Option Backspace: Back During Gameplay: AD/Left and Right Keys: Move Ship Space or Enter: Shoot Backspace: Return to Menu
